scripts.prep:kovan: npm run prep:kovan:l1 && npm run prep:kovan:l2
scripts.prep:mainnet: npm run prep:mainnet:l1 && npm run prep:mainnet:l2
scripts.codegen: npm run codegen:l1 && npm run codegen:l2
scripts.build: npm run build:l1 && npm run build:l2
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run deploy:mainnet:l1 && npm run deploy:mainnet:l2
scripts.deploy:mainnet:l1: dotenv -e .env -- cross-var "cd optimism-l1-subgraph && graph deploy --access-token %THE_GRAPH_API_KEY% --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ethereum-optimism-2/optimism-l1-mainnet subgraph.yaml && cd .."
scripts.deploy:mainnet:l2: dotenv -e .env -- cross-var "cd optimism-l2-subgraph && graph deploy --access-token %THE_GRAPH_API_KEY% --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ethereum-optimism-2/optimism-l2-mainnet subgraph.yaml && cd .."
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run deploy:kovan:l1 && npm run deploy:kovan:l2
scripts.deploy:kovan:l1: dotenv -e .env -- cross-var "cd optimism-l1-subgraph && graph deploy --access-token %THE_GRAPH_API_KEY% --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ethereum-optimism-2/optimism-l1-kovan subgraph.yaml && cd .."
scripts.deploy:kovan:l2: dotenv -e .env -- cross-var "cd optimism-l2-subgraph && graph deploy --access-token %THE_GRAPH_API_KEY% --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ethereum-optimism-2/optimism-l2-kovan subgraph.yaml && cd .."
